website_summaries.verdict: A spacious 2-room utility tent with air vents that's durable and easy to set up.
pros: Zippered middle panel allows 2 people to use the tent at once while maintaining privacy
Alternately, you could create one large space
cons: Only includes a hook for a shower bag
for other items, you may have to rig your own setup

customer_reviews.title: Great sized shower tent and good sized room for portable ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sized shower tent and good sized room for portable potty. Took this tent to Bonnaroo and it did not disappoint. Don't have to walk half a mile to use the nasty porta-restrooms. Didn't have to wait in line to shower. You can take this anywhere! Great product. Sturdy. Thick. Fast to put up and away. You can take this anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camping accessorie
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent to have on any camping trip or in a emergency situation. Easy to put up and take down. Quality made all the way! Can tell it's a class above the rest just by the lack of chemical smell, most all others seem to have. It's light weight and one of my favorite camping accessories I am now proud to own.
customer_reviews.author: grammy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: We use this as an emergency port-a-potty in conjunction with a medical commode (post hurricane, etc.). It allows you to put the commode in one side and have an "entrance" on the other side. This is pretty easy to set-up and has everything it advertises. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: 2 rooms with enough space
customer_reviews.text: We go camping every year and we usually make our own shower but we decided buy one this year. We bought this one and we loved the fact it has 2 rooms. 1 to shower and the other 1 to change. Worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: nali catano

customer_reviews.title: If you are using it as a changing or bathroom tent then it would be great. Set up was easy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy, doesn’t hold a water bag at all. Actually the first time a put a water bag in it the tent collapsed. If you are using it as a changing or bathroom tent then it would be great. Set up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor bathroom/changing room
customer_reviews.text: Good to use as an outdoor bathroom but the shower aspect of it isn't realistic. There's nothing to hang the included bag from and doubt it would hold the weight if there was. On the plus side it is very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great idea needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but hard to understand directions on how to store away. Still haven't got it back in the storage bag
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a long camping trip so we would have a place to shower. There’s actually no place to hang a shower bag in this tent at all so its basically useless as a shower tent. Even if there were a place to hang the bag the material is definitely not strong enough to support the weight of a five gallon bag. Needless to say, very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: easy setup. Could have a more supportive system for ...
customer_reviews.text: easy setup. Could have a more supportive system for hanging the 5 gal water pouch. Otherwise a good purchase and appreciated when no shower is available at campsite
customer_reviews.author: Brady E Inches

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this for our camping trip. It was great for showering and we put a portable toilet on the other side. It was great for our primitive camping trip! We had wind and rain and it held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased. This was a big hit on our 5 day camping. We had people stop to ask about it. It was sturdy and so easy to put up. Used one side for our shower and the second one for our flushing toliet we bought on Amazon. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sized shower tent! Additionally, I had to work with the company on returning an item and they were very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: BaroneFamly

customer_reviews.title: Good for changing clothes only
customer_reviews.text: Shower doesn't hook up. Too heavy for the tent. Now we just use it for a really expensive changing tent
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Ingwaldson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but no where to hang the 5 gallon bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice but no where to hang the 5 gallon bag and one of the top pieces broke in the first week. Other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Davila

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love love this.good material. easy set-up. love the extra pockets. cant wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!  Roomy tent!
customer_reviews.text: The tent is spacious and easy to set up. Take down is simple and everything performs as it should! Fantastic customer service from these guys after a slight defect with our first tent. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

product_meta.title: Quictent 2019 Upgraded Oversize 2 Room Pop Up Automatic Rod Bracket Shower Tent/Changing/Toilet Room Camping Privacy Shelter Camping Outdoor Waterproof Anti-UV with Carry Bag
feature_bullets: 【Large size & Great ventilation】It is taller and wider than others with a dimension up to 7’(H)x7.87’(L)x3.6’(W), good privacy provided. Two mesh side windows allow air circulation. It is perfect as a shower tent, changing room, portable toilet…
【Easy to Setup & Easy Transport】Take down within 5 Minutes. No tools required, Lightweight and comes with a carry bag for easy transport.
【Extra-thick canvas】100% Waterproof, Anti-UV silver-coated Oxford fabric. The oxford has no pungent smell. Compared to other materials on the market, it is more environmentally friendly.

【Much Thicker poles】The whole frame are assembled together by high strength Aluminum Leg pole & 9.5mm (Dia)fiberglass frame. The fiberglass frame has higher strength, better toughness, and better abrasion resistance, much more stronger and stable than other Steel poles.
【Excellent after-sale service】1 YEARS WARRANTY&THE SAME DAY SHIPPING

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars33 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
